select i.inpatientid,i.bednumber,i.healthcard,i.EntryTime,i.LeaveTime,i.Name,i.CurrentDeptID,i.conversiondept,d1.DEPTNAME currentdeptname,t.ConversionDept LastConversionDept from CD_Inpatient i Left join AI_DeptInfo d1 on d1.DEPTID=i.CurrentDeptID Left join (SELECT t1.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY inpatientid ORDER BY CONVERSIONTIME DESC) rn FROM CD_Transfer t1) t on t.inpatientid = i.inpatientid
i.CurrentDeptID=:DpetID i.Name like '%#Name#%' (i.InpatientId=:Zyh or i.HealthCard=:Zyh) i.EntryTime > to_date('#EntryTimeStart# 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') i.EntryTime < to_date('#EntryTimeStop# 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') i.LeaveTime > to_date('#LeaveTimeStart# 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') i.LeaveTime < to_date('#LeaveTimeStop# 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by i.EntryTime desc

select dept.deptname,i.name,i.inpatientid,i.healthcard ,NVL2(hr.hospitalrecordid,'√','×') hashospitalrecord ,NVL2(pn.progressnoteid,'√','×') hasprogressnotefirst ,NVL2(f.formemrid,'√','×') hasconsent ,NVL2(mrh.homepageid,'√','×') hashomepage ,NVL2(ohr.outhospitalrecordid,'√','×') hasouthospitalrecord from CD_INPATIENT i left join AI_DEPTINFO dept on i.currentdeptid=dept.deptid left join CD_HospitalRecord hr on hr.inpatientid=i.inpatientid left join CD_ProgressNote pn on pn.inpatientid=i.inpatientid and pn.progresstypeid='50' left join (select max(fe.formemrid) formemrid,fe.inpatientid from CD_FormEmr fe left join CD_FormEmrTemplate fet on fe.formid=fet.templateid where fet.templatetype='10' group by fe.inpatientid ) f on f.inpatientid=i.inpatientid left join CD_MedicalRecordHomePage mrh on mrh.inpatientid=i.inpatientid left join CD_OuthospitalRecord ohr on ohr.inpatientid=i.inpatientid
i.CurrentDeptID=:DpetID i.Name like '%#Name#%' (i.InpatientId=:Zyh or i.HealthCard=:Zyh) i.LeaveTime > to_date('#LeaveTimeStart# 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') i.LeaveTime < to_date('#LeaveTimeStop# 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by i.LeaveTime desc

select i.inpatientid,dept.deptname,decode(i.MedicalState,'0','在院','1','预出院','2','出院','3','死亡') MedicalState,doctor1.username ReceptionDoctor,doctor2.username AttendingDoctor,i.bednumber,i.name,i.healthcard,i.entrytime from Cd_Inpatient i left join Ai_Deptinfo dept on dept.deptid=i.currentdeptid left join GI_Userinfo doctor1 on doctor1.userid=i.ReceptionDoctorId left join Gi_Userinfo doctor2 on doctor2.userid=i.AttendingDoctorId
dept.deptid in (#DpetIDList#) i.entrytime < to_date('#Entrytime# 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and MedicalState=0 and ParentsName is null order by dept.deptid,i.bednumber asc
